metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14609 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: The server daemons in Kannel 1.5.0 and earlier create a PID file after dropping privileges to a non-root account, which might allow local users to kill arbitrary processes by leveraging access to this non-root account for PID file modification before a root script executes a "kill `cat /pathname`" command, as demonstrated by bearerbox.

criterions.comment: kannel package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
